about_the_game:
The World of Nifty Craft is a 2D fantasy sandbox multiplayer RPG featuring a Real Time Card Battler combat system, high stakes real-time PvPvE battles, and a crafting based player-driven economy. Explore the vast open-world, gather and manage resources, craft your gear, steal, survive and fight.

Your Nifty Craft Adventure is written by you!





Explore the vast open world along with other players. Enjoy diverse landscapes and biomes, and search for and gather the right materials you will need for crafting. Fight off monsters along the way and get rewarded with valuable loot.



A new twist to MMORPGs with a deck builder Realtime battle. Engage in exciting and strategic combat against monsters, players or bosses. Outsmart your enemy, build your own fighting, and customize your deck by collecting and slotting various runes (fighting abilities) into your gear.



Experience our intuitive controls for easy pickup by newcomers and a skill-based progression system for mastering advanced techniques. Diverse abilities and gear-dependent classes let players experiment with multiple paths to suit their playstyle. The dynamic, real-time combat system adds an exciting twist to traditional card-battling games.



Engage in challenging battles against players or NPC mobs, testing your skills and strategy. Epic bosses guard outposts, requiring coordinated efforts to defeat them. In competitive zones, prove your prowess in thrilling PvP battles with high stakes. Join a guild and participate in the ongoing war for dominance.



Complete freedom in deciding who you are. Hundreds of possible combinations of gear items: mix and match helmets, armor, weapons, and boots. There are plenty of different skills to master and your progression is tied to the equipment you use. Easily switch and adapt your gear choices based on your evolving playstyle or just try out something different.





Trade items with other players in a dynamic marketplace. Craft powerful gear from gathered resources and sell them. Influence the evolving economy through player-run markets. Set up your own shop and become the biggest merchant in your town.





The game is viable for free-to-play players who invest time to progress and earn premium currency through gameplay and effort.
We do offer the ability to buy in-game currency with real money, but items can be lost in PvP encounters.
You can subscribe to an optional premium subscription which accelerates the progression rate but it does not give combat advantages.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel/AMD CPU with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DirectX 10 support or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Processor: Intel/AMD CPU with SSE2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DirectX 10 support or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
